channel.title: Looking for 317 Coder
channel.description:
Hey guy's i'm looking for a 317 coder, does not have to have good knowledge, just decent. If needed will pay, but will not pay very much, seeing as what i am asking is very basic. as in:
1. editing achievement diary
2. Changing Client Background
3. Making a different owner crown and making owners not lose items on death-player rights 3 if you didn't know.
4. This one could be harder, but i would like the current korasi sword gfx special. I have the special already with lightning but the emotion is the drag scim spec.
Please list below what of the 4 you can do and your msn after adding me so i know who is who. Thanks
add me- bammaster7@hotmail.com

item.title: Looking for 317 Coder
item.dc:creator: @wanwan69 wanwan69
item.description:
@wanwan69 wrote:

I know i did try and fix it, but this seems different, that’s why i’m looking for help via teamviewer, but i’ll try again, thanks :D, if you can help through team viewer add my msn- bammaster7@hotmail.com, the korasi spec isn’t a huge deal, just would be cool.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for 317 Coder
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

I will help you xD. Achievment diary is client sided i believe, the client background is in the sprites folder or another folder in the cache, replace the modicons1 or w/e for owner crown in the sprites folder within the cache.

for the korasi spec i am almost positive there is a tutorial in the tut section.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for 317 Coder
item.dc:creator: @wanwan69 wanwan69
item.description:
@wanwan69 wrote:

Well rule number 3 states:

We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

I do have prior knowledge, and i HAVE tried to fix it myself and it does not turn out correct, so then i ask for help.

And about requesting a coder, I’m requesting somebody to HELP ME With a couple problems, I am not looking for a permanent coder As you may think i am. If you guys don’t have any Productive to say, Don’t post, and Thank you Cali, added.

Read full topic
